properties.description: 7 days a week. Midday - 10.00pm. Copr Bar is a licensed cafe serving hot food and drinks. It has sofas, ample seating and chairs, a piano and provides an independent and friendly welcome. SA1UTE military charity is also based at Copr and often hosts free coffee mornings - kept an eye out for on social media or inside the premises. SA1UTE/COPR also operate a Pay it Forward scheme where members of the public donate to the charity/business and they turn each £5 into a hot meal, treat, hot drink. This scheme is operating currently and is open to anyone in a vulnerable position. ; Free wifi; Free charging points for phones or other devices; Accessible entrance / venue; Toilets; Accessible toilets; Baby changing facilities; Children's play area; Games / board games; Outdoor space; Refreshments available; the premises offers a full menu of food and drinks to purchase; Copr operates a Pay it Forward scheme where people can approach the bar and ask if there are any funds in reserve to help people in a vulnerable position; ; Drinking water available; Book borrowing / book swap; Television; Advice, information and signposting; SA1UTE charity is based at Copr and has links with many other support groups in the community.; ;

properties.description: We meet every Tuesday and Friday, 10.00am - 11.30am Join us for a hot cuppa, a slice of toast and a chat! Games, cards, dominoes all available or bring your craft. ; Accessible entrance / venue; Toilets; Accessible toilets; Car parking; Disabled parking; Outdoor space; Refreshments available; hot drinks, toast and biscuits; ; Drinking water available; Food bank / food share; we can refer you to the food bank as required and the food would be delivered to you at home; ; Book borrowing / book swap;
properties.title: Penclawdd Community Centre
